application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 Leyland Cypress - Reduce height by 4m. Remove 3 lowest stems back to point of origin. Reduce lateral growth by 2m and trim remaining sides as hard as practical. T2 Yew & Box elder - Reduce height by 2m and prune lateral growth as required to shape and balance.T3 Portuguese Laurel - Reduce height by 2-3m and trim client size as hard as practicable. Fell small shrub adjacent to larger specimen and grind out shrub. T4 Conifer - Section fell to as close to ground level as practicable.T5 Almond - Remove selected stems on the left and right side to create a more upright form. Reduce remaining stems in height spread by 2-3m to previous reduction points.G6 Conifer x 3 - Section fell to as close to ground level as practicable.T7 Cherry - Section fell to as close to ground level as practicable.T8 Conifer - Reduce height by 4m.T9 Hornbeam x 2 - Crown reduce the height and spread of the tree by up to 4m. Remove left most limb on left tree.T10 Hornbeam - Crown reduce the height and spread of the tree by up to 4m.T11 Hornbeam - Crown reduce the height and spread of the tree by up to 3m. Remove all epicormic growth.T13 Leyland Cypress in rear garden adjacent to young Birch - Reduce height by 4.5m. Crown lift by 2m.
